mapper.select: SELECT LogId , AcuntId , ActinDt , ActinReasn , ActinType , ActinRslt , ActinFunc , InsId , InsDt , UptId , UptDt FROM TB_AcuntLog WHERE LogId = #{logId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AcuntLog AS A INNER JOIN TB_Mngr AS B ON A.InsId = B.MngrId WHERE 1=1 AND (A.AcuntId = #{acuntId}) AND (IFNULL(#{actinType}, '') = '' OR A.ActinType = #{actinType})

SELECT A.LogId , A.AcuntId , A.ActinDt , A.ActinReasn , A.ActinType , A.ActinRslt , A.ActinFunc , A.InsId , A.InsDt , B.MngrNm , fnGetCdNm(A.ActinType) AS ActinTypeNm FROM TB_AcuntLog AS A INNER JOIN TB_Mngr AS B ON A.InsId = B.MngrId WHERE 1=1 AND (A.AcuntId = #{acuntId}) AND (IFNULL(#{actinType}, '') = '' OR A.ActinType = #{actinType}) ORDER BY A.LogId DESC LIMIT #{paging.startRow}, #{paging.rowCntInPage}
